roleset.name: confuse

example.name: transitive, all args
example.text: It is engendered [*-1] by [*]confounding the Aristotelian cosmology in TheAlmagest with the geocentric astronomy .

example.name: passive, arg0 and arg1
example.text: Travelers entering from the desert were confounded [*]by what [*T*-2] musthave seemed an illusion : a great garden filled [*] with nightingales and roses, cut [*] by canals and terraced promenades , studded [*] with water tanks ofturquoise tile in which were reflected [*T*-3] the glistening blue curves of ahundred domes .
example.arg: [*]by what [*T*-2] musthave seemed an illusion : a great garden filled [*] with nightingales and roses, cut [*] by canals and terraced promenades , studded [*] with water tanks ofturquoise tile in which were reflected [*T*-3] the glistening blue curves of ahundred domes

roleset.note: CONFOUND-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from confound.01-v)
